title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8-1.3 - Applicability of rules on administration of tax
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8-1.3 - Applicability of rules on administration of tax

State Regulations
(Tax Law, section 209-B)

All of the procedural provisions concerning the
administration of the tax imposed by section 209, in law and in regulation, including the provisions of article 27 and the regulations promulgated
thereunder, shall apply to the tax surcharge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8-1.3

Adopted

New

York State Register December 27, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 52, eff. 12/27/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
